content.rendered:
Directed by K.V. Guhan

Written by Mirchi Kiran

Cast Nandamuri Kalyan Ram (Goutham (as Kalyan Ram)). Shalini Pandey (Megha). Nivetha Thomas (Aadhya). Nassar (Dr. Athmaram Divakar). Habib Al Aidroos (V.N. Shah (as Al Aidroos Habib Ismaeel)). Geetha Bhascker (Goutham’s Mother). Sandhya Janak (Megha’s Mother). Kedar Shankar (Megha’s Father). Paata Uttej (Prabhavathi). Hari Teja (Esther). Prabhas Sreenu (Ramesh). Rajeev Kanakala (Raghuram). Bharath Reddy (Police Officer K. Ravindra). Mukhtar Khan (Ashok). Viren Thambidorai (Father Francis). Deekshitulu (Velayudam). Gagan Vihari (Rony). Sravan (Hitman). Meena Vasu (Nun). Rajsekhar Aningi (Devaraj). Chammak Chandra (Pandu). Mirchi Kiran (Prasad). Ashok Kumar (Murthy). Sivannarayana (Receptionist). Sasidhar ((as Shashidhar Paramahamsa)).C.V.L. Narasimha Rao. Harshavardhan. Surekha Vani. Mahesh Achanta. Konda Babu. Aadarsh Balakrishna. Sharmila Bhargavi. Muni Chandra. Deva Sri. Vajja Venkata Giridhar. Sandeep Jawalkar. Vennela Rama Rao.Revathinath.G.B. Ramakrishna Sastry. Ramayya Sastry. Sri Teja

Languages Telugu

Producers Mahesh S. Koneru

Production East Coast Production
